text:
Question 62) By traveling the route of a food chain, carbon, an essential and majority element of organic matter that composes individuals, sometimes in its inorganic form, sometimes in its organic form. In a food chain composed of Ô¨Å toplankton, zooplankton, mollusks, crustaceans and fish there is the transition from this element from inorganic to organic form.
In which group of organisms does this transition occur?
A) Phytoplankton.
B) Zooplankton.
C) mollusks.
D) crustaceans.
E) fish.
